transcript.name: Rohan
transcript.message: Hi Kevin, Good morning!

transcript.name: KEVIN
transcript.message: Hi Rohan, Good morning. Do we have everyone on the call?

transcript.name: Rohan
transcript.message: Yes. I have the complete off-shore mobile development team with me.

transcript.name: KEVIN
transcript.message: Great. Let’s get started.We have been planning version 2 of our mobile apps and in the last week me and Rohan sat together and worked on the back log items as well as added a few new features to the sprint. I hope everyone has gone through the sprint plan and assigned tasks. So, Let’s quickly share updates on current tasks. Rohan, why don’t you go first.

transcript.name: Rohan
transcript.message: Yes , sure kevin. So, I have picked up task 12 which is implementing login with google module in the iOS application. I’ll be exploring how to go about this task and find if there are any SDKs available to integrate single sign on. Kevin , any updates from the UX team regarding wireframes ?

transcript.name: KEVIN
transcript.message: Hmm.. no. The UX team is currently still working on the app screen design.

transcript.name: Rohan
transcript.message: Okay. I’ll check what backend changes will be required for implementing this module and get back to you. I’ll send a mail to you kevin ,with the backend changes necessary.

transcript.name: KEVIN
transcript.message: Oh okay. I wasn’t anticipating backend changes for this module. Yes , I’ll wait for you mail and intimate the backend team.

transcript.name: Rohan
transcript.message: okay. Also kevin, as the website team has already implemented google login, can we have a quick call set up with them? It will be help us understand the google login feature better.

transcript.name: KEVIN
transcript.message: Umm… that should be possible. I’ll make a note of this.

transcript.name: Rohan
transcript.message: ok. I’ll get started with this task. That’s it from my end.

transcript.name: KEVIN
transcript.message: Alright. Thanks Rohan. John , why don’t you go next ?

transcript.name: John
transcript.message: Hi Kevin, I went through the sprint plan. About task 17, google login module I’ll wait for Rohan to implement that in iOS application first. I’ll take up task 24 today which mentions implementing credit card payment in android application. I had worked on This task before and it seems fairly straight forward and I should be able to complete it fast.

transcript.name: KEVIN
transcript.message: That’s great. Have a look and let me know if you need anything. Moving on, Sagar tell me your updates.

transcript.name: Sagar
transcript.message: Hi, I have gone through my tasks, I’ll be working on task 41 next, which mentions preparing a test case document for google login module in both applications. Kevin, I had some questions about this feature.

transcript.name: KEVIN
transcript.message: yes Sagar, go ahead

transcript.name: Sagar
transcript.message: How do we handle the users who do not prefer google login? as in if they wish to stick to the earlier login style will there be an option to do that?

transcript.name: KEVIN
transcript.message: I see. That’s a good point Sagar. Rohan, do you have any suggestions for this?

transcript.name: Rohan
transcript.message: Hmmm.. I feel we could implement what Sagar suggested. Let’s keep an option for users to choose between old login style and google login.

transcript.name: KEVIN
transcript.message: Okay. That should be fine.Any more updates?

transcript.name: Sagar
transcript.message: No.That’s all from my end.
